eventDecorators.name: LogAccessLiquidity

eventDecorators.name: LogWithdrawLiquidity

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: token address.(For ETH: 0xEeeeeEeeeEeEeeEeEeEeeEEEeeeeEeeeeeeeEEeE).

parameterDecorators.name: amt
parameterDecorators.description: token amount.

parameterDecorators.name: getId
parameterDecorators.description: Get token amount at this ID from `InstaMemory` Contract.

parameterDecorators.name: setId
parameterDecorators.description: Set token amount at this ID in `InstaMemory` Contract.

parameterDecorators.name: getId
